landing.overview:
We're A Search Agency.
Maximizing your fucking business potential! And redefining how you do business on the fucking web! Through a whole lotta shit approach to search!

We're Not Just A Search Agency.
Fucking Bang! We make shit better and faster, and, fuck we kill people!

We take your Money.
Shit, and we'll tell you just about anything to get it from you!

We Got Guts Like People.
Man, we don't even know what kind of pink and grey shit is inside our bodies. It freaks us the shit out!
